content: प्रथम [प्रथ्-अमच्] (<ab>Nom.</ab> <ab>pl.</ab>, {%<ab>m.</ab>%} प्रथमे or प्रथमाः) {@--1@} First, foremost; <ls>R. 3. 44</ls>; <ls>H. 2. 39</ls>; <ls>Ki. 2. 44.</ls> {@--2@} First, chief, principal, most excellent or eminent, matchless, incomparable; <ls>Śi. 15. 42</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 147.</ls> {@--3@} Earliest, most ancient, primary. {@--4@} Prior, previous, former, earlier; प्रथमसुकृतापेक्षया <ls>Me. 17</ls>, <ls>R. 10. 67.</ls> {@--5@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The first person (= third person according to European phraseology). --मः {@--1@} The first (third) person. {@--2@} The first consonant of a class. --मा The nominative case. --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} First, firstly, at first; <ls>Ku. 7. 24</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Already, previously, formerly; प्रथमोदितं aforesaid; <ls>R. 3. 68.</ls> {@--3@} At once, immediately. {@--4@} Before; यात्रायै चोदयामास तं शक्तेः प्रथमं शरत् <ls>R. 4. 24</ls>; उत्तिष्ठेत्यथमं चास्य चरमं चैव संविशेत् <ls>Ms. 2. 194.</ls> {@--5@} Newly, recently. प्रथमं अनंतरं or ततः or पश्चात् first, afterwards; प्रथमात् firstly, for the first time; प्रथमतः {@--1@} At first, firstly; {@--2@} previously. {@--3@} immediately; {@--4@} before, in preference to (<ab>gen.</ab>)
